markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Giant Dragonfly](/Monsters.aspx?ID=638)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These buzzing insects are the size of a small horse. They are ambush predators known to hunt beasts and humanoids alike, capable of using impressive aerial acrobatics to swoop down from above and snatch away their prey.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Giant Dragonfly](/Monsters.aspx?ID=638)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 98 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +11; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [wavesense (imprecise) 30 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=41)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +10, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** -5

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +9 

</row>

**HP** 60

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, fly 60 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
mandibles +14,
**Damage** 1d12+7 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Clutch** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The giant dragonfly has a Medium or smaller creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) in its mandibles; **Effect** The dragonfly tries to transfer the grabbed creature to be clutched by its legs. The giant dragonfly attempts an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check against the creature's Reflex DC. On a success, it transfers the creature (which remains grabbed) to its legs, freeing its mandibles to attack. The dragonfly can have only one creature clutched at a time.

**Snatch**   The giant dragonfly can Fly at half Speed while it has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) by Clutch, carrying that creature along with it.

**Swoop** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The giant dragonfly Flies up to its Speed and makes one mandible Strike at any point during that movement.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-133" />
name: Giant Dragonfly

The giant dragonfly attempts an Athletics check against the creature's Reflex DC. On a success, it transfers the creature (which remains grabbed) to its legs, freeing its mandibles to attack. The dragonfly can have only one creature clutched at a time. Snatch The giant dragonfly can Fly at half Speed while it has a creature grabbed or restrained by Clutch, carrying that creature along with it.
